C

Cell - Class in mines
The Cell class implements ICell interface and represents a cell on the game board.
Cell(int, Image) - Constructor for class mines.Cell
Creates a new Cell instance with the given index and image.
cellContent - Variable in class mines.Cell
The content of the cell, represented as an integer that corresponds to a specific image.
cellImage - Variable in class mines.Cell
The image of the cell.
cellLeftClicked(int) - Method in class mines.Board.MinesAdapter
Handles a left mouse click event on a cell in the game panel.
cellRightClicked(int) - Method in class mines.Board.MinesAdapter
Handles a right mouse click event on a cell in the game panel.
CellState - Enum in mines
The CellState enum represents the possible states of a cell in a Minesweeper game.
CellState() - Constructor for enum mines.CellState
 
cellTotalMinedCornersTest() - Method in class mines.BoardTest
 
checkCell(Image) - Method in class mines.Cell
Sets the cell state to CHECKED.
checkCell(Image) - Method in interface mines.ICell
Marks the cell as checked.
CHECKED - mines.CellState
the cell has been checked and its content is visible.
checkedCells - Variable in class mines.Board
The total number of checked cells .
checkWining() - Method in class mines.Board
Checks if the player has won the game.
checkWiningTest() - Method in class mines.BoardTest
 
clickingLeftForNewGameTest() - Method in class mines.BoardTest
 
clickingRightForNewGameTest() - Method in class mines.BoardTest
 
clickingToUnMarkAlreadyMarkedCellTest() - Method in class mines.BoardTest
 
COLS - Static variable in class mines.Board
The number of columns in the game board.
column - Variable in class mines.Cell
The column number of the cell.
Corner - Enum in mines
The Corner enum represents the possible corners of a cell on the board game.
Corner() - Constructor for enum mines.Corner
 
corners - Variable in class mines.Cell
A map containing the indices of each of the cell's corners.
cornersMineCell - Variable in class mines.Cell
The total number of mined corner cells surrounding this cell.
COVER_FOR_CELL - Static variable in class mines.Board
The index of the cover image.
